summary: After losing her twin brother to suicide, a woman blames her brothers ex-girlfriend and plans to take her revenge.
cast: Alexandra Paul|Cynthia Preston|Paul Whitney|Deborah Grover|Ron Gabriel|Philip Craig|Cinthia Burke|Richard Nash|Daniel Simpson|Sean Tucker|Peter Michael Dillon|Kathy Logan|Claudia Jurt|Ken Proulx|John Sinclair|Claude Huard|Anik Rompré
title: El secreto de una hermana
